title: PMS 2.0 668 - Feel Good Friday With George Kittle, Quentin Richardson, Bobby Carpenter, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s podcast Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys talk about Greg Olsen being the new broadcaster for Super Bowl LVII, the 49er’s future, the NBA playoffs, everything else going on in the sports world, and the VeeCon event being hosted today. Joining the progrum in the first hour is All-Pro, 3x Pro Bowler, and current Tight End of the 49ers, George Kittle to talk about the growth and future of TEU, his background in the position, hopes for the 2022 season, and more (14:43-38:07). Later in hour two, Pat and AJ have on former 13-year NBA veteran, NBA All-Star Weekend Three-Point Shootout champion in 2005, and host of Knuckleheads podcast Quentin Richardson to talk about the teams and storylines in the NBA playoffs (57:50-1:19:23). Lastly Pat, AJ, and the boys chat with  former NFL Linebacker, former Ohio State Buckeye, and radio host of The Fan, General Bob Carpenter, to talk about the Nick Saban and Jimbo Fisher situation and Ohio State football (1:19:25-1:51:06). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all of you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
